1f8387eb43f131d7c309a90a4e36b5cb (00:42): 3b630800966be5c4f7eb283c363eb7f4: Mutation events carry too much unwipeable info about the shadow, so yeah, they shouldn't escape the shadow.

3b630800966be5c4f7eb283c363eb7f4 (00:43): 1f8387eb43f131d7c309a90a4e36b5cb: we're going to do the both

3b630800966be5c4f7eb283c363eb7f4 (00:43): 1f8387eb43f131d7c309a90a4e36b5cb: so there won't be any mutation event in the shadow DOM

1f8387eb43f131d7c309a90a4e36b5cb (00:43): 6b57ea7f33069df5914663ba9e59afdf: Within a shadow, mutation observers can be useful I guess.
